game.name: Abelina
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Explore a surreal wilderness by platforming and use timing based hits to gather resources. Break open branching paths to get to the other side of a giant world, talk to it's strange inhabitants, and try to understand the nature of this world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore a surreal wilderness by platforming and use timing based hits to gather resources. Break open branching paths to get to the other side of a giant world, talk to it's strange inhabitants, and try to understand the nature of this world.
